extendedIngredients.name: amaranth
extendedIngredients.original: ½ cup amaranth, soaked if possible (minimum 8 hours)

extendedIngredients.original: pinch of: cinnamon, ginger, nutmeg, clove (or substitute all with pumpkin pie spice)
extendedIngredients.originalName: pinch of: cinnamon, ginger, nutmeg, clove (or substitute all with pumpkin pie spice)

extendedIngredients.name: coconut milk
extendedIngredients.original: 1 cup coconut milk, or water (you may need more if using un-soaked grains)

meta: (you may need more if using un-soaked grains)

extendedIngredients.name: pumpkin puree
extendedIngredients.original: 1/3 cup pumpkin puree (preferably fresh, or canned)

title: Pumpkin Pie Amaranth Porridge
summary: Pumpkin Pie Amaranth Porridge is a gluten free, fodmap friendly, and vegan morn meal. One portion of this dish contains approximately 10g of protein, 37g of fat, and a total of 565 calories. This recipe serves 2 and costs $3.53 per serving. Head to the store and pick up amaranth, sea salt, pumpkin puree, and a few other things to make it today. Thanksgiving will be even more special with this recipe. 1 person has made this recipe and would make it again. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes about 45 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 72%. This score is good. Try Amaranth Porridge, Blueberries ‘n’ Cream Amaranth Porridge, and Coconut Rhubarb Amaranth Porridge for similar recipes.
